group.name: Lessons
group.item: Lessons explain concepts. They are used as presentations in an instructor-led class.
If any presentations are captured on video, this icon will link to the playback for it.

group.name: Examples
group.item: Examples are zipped source code files that demonstrate a concept or technique.
Some examples are provided through Github repositories.

group.name: Tutorials
group.item: Tutorials are presentations that walk the learner through a set of related tasks.
Many tutorials will have a related Github repository, linked to inside the tutorial.

group.name: Labs
group.item: Labs are exercises to apply what you learned in a tutorial.
Registered students will submit their completed labs to a Desire2Learn dropbox for feedback and grading.

group.name: Assignments
group.item: Assignments are team projects, building a webapp using the techniques from this course, in 3 stages.
Registered students will submit their completed assignments to a Desire2Learn dropbox for feedback and grading.

group.name: Exams
group.item: Registered students will write a midterm and final exam, on campus.
Quizzes may be made available online, for immediate learner feedback.
